column3: There was a huge bunch of strange UI elements, like using word for creating a table that should have used Excel ;). Anyway, I couldn't sort out scaling and resize issues, some elemts are wrongly sized and I need help with that. I'm fine with another GUI guy taking this or creating a pull for my branch.\n
IMO the current order makes more sense.\n
I prefer fees at the bottom, closest to the 'send' button. Also think the current order makes more sense, from a usage flow perspective (select inputs - set recipients - choose fee).\n

I also think the fees should be at the bottom. Fees are something which normally comes at the end of a payment process. Changing the payment screen makes only sense if it's a real improvement. Otherwise it might confuse users.\n\nBut i agree that there are some uncommon ways of handling the sendcoinsdialog. The "Choose..." (expand) button is uncommon and the position of the maximize/minimize butto
Closing this for now. I'm open to improvements for the spending screen, but I don't agree that this is an improvement. Just moving panes around is bound to confuse people.\n
